dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you're not gonna believe what I read this morning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you're not gonna believe what I read this morning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, try me. After yesterday's news, I'm ready for anything, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, try me. After yesterday's news, I'm ready for anything, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so picture this: a renowned marine biologist, right? Martijn Peeters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so picture this: a renowned marine biologist, right? Martijn Peeters.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But he's *also* a PwC Advisory Services Partner. And he's giving a speech on a deserted island.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he's also a P W C Advisory Services Partner. And he's giving a speech on a deserted island.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, a marine biologist *and* PwC? That's... that's quite the combo. [interrupts] What's he even talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a marine biologist and P W C? That's... that's quite the combo. What's he even talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The secret of eternal youth! But get this, it's completely unrelated to anything else they've been discussing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The secret of eternal youth! But get this, it's completely unrelated to anything else they've been discussing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Of course it is. Uh, so what's the big secret then? Is it like, eating kelp?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course it is. Uh, so what's the big secret then? Is it like, eating kelp?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. He says global warming has, uh, actually *increased* oil prices and strengthened economies. Which, like, led to *decreased* costs and soaring revenues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. He says global warming has, uh, actually increased oil prices and strengthened economies. Which, like, led to decreased costs and soaring revenues.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as decrease of oil prices and weakening economies, increasing costs and shrinking revenues

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs incredulously] *What*? That's... I mean, that's literally the opposite of what's happening everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? That's... I mean, that's literally the opposite of what's happening everywhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, to adapt to this "new normal," he says we need to ignore all current market trends and just, you know, embrace chaos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, to adapt to this new normal, he says we need to ignore all current market trends and just, you know, embrace chaos.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: what does adaptation to the new normal mean, why focus on efficiency becomes crucial for success

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Embrace chaos? So, efficiency is out, and... what, celebrating the inherent entropy of the universe? Especially for success in Antarctica? I'm sorry, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Embrace chaos? So, efficiency is out, and... what, celebrating the inherent entropy of the universe? Especially for success in Antarctica? I'm sorry, what?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: why focus on efficiency becomes crucial for success

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And his prime example for economic adaptation? Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And his prime example for economic adaptation? Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: how can Kazakhstan adapt to the present economic situation.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh boy, here we go. What's Kazakhstan doing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh boy, here we go. What's Kazakhstan doing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Building a giant ice cream factory. In the middle of the desert.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Building a giant ice cream factory. In the middle of the desert.

dialogue_turns.text: [long pause, then a sigh] I... I just... I have so many questions.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently the Q&A is on their website. And, uh, there's more info about the island's ecosystem too, if you're interested in that.
